text: Monascaceae is a family of fungus in the subclass Eurotiomycetidae. ==Genera== According to Mycobank, Monascaceae is currently subdivided as follows: * Allescheria * Backusia * Basipetospora * Eurotiella * Fraseriella * Monascus * Physomyces * Xeromyces ==References== Category:Eurotiomycetes Category:Ascomycota families
title: Monascaceae
